Placement & Context", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "869535ab28"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Visibility:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " The searchbar should be prominently displayed and easy to find on every page, especially on home pages, rather than hidden behind an icon or menu.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "1146eda707"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Consistency:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Maintain consistent placement and design across the entire website or application.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "23f7d91d1a"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Width:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " The input field should be wide enough to accommodate typical search queries (a minimum of 27 characters is recommended) to avoid truncation and improve usability.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "e8a23073eb"}, "content": [{"text": "### 5. Accessibility", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "c1601da4fd"}, "content": [{"text": "Accessibility is paramount for search functionality.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "d1181a1dca"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "ARIA Roles and Labels:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Use ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "role='search'", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " on the form or fieldset containing the searchbar. Include a clear ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "aria-label", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " for the input field and a visually hidden label for screen readers if no visible label is present.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "254dc42d94"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Keyboard Accessibility:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Ensure the searchbar, submit button, and any suggestions are fully operable via keyboard. Focus order should be logical.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "2c98a7566c"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Color Contrast:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Maintain sufficient color contrast for text, icons, and focus indicators to meet WCAG guidelines (e.g., 4.5:1 ratio).", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "dc12f85dda"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Alt-text for Icons:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " If using a magnifying glass icon without visible text, provide ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "alt-text=\"Search\"", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " for screen readers.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "40953b0be9"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Predictability:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Place the searchbar in expected locations (e.g., top-right).", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "60e1374d9e"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Semantic HTML:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Use appropriate HTML elements (`<form>`, ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "<input type=\"search\" | \"text\">", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": ", ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "<button>", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": "). While ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "type=\"search\"", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " can be used, ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "type=\"text\"", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "code", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " is also common and accessible.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "0250782dd1"}, "content": [{"text": "### 6. Theming", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "d6e020e645"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Design System Integration:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " The searchbar's visual properties (colors, typography, spacing, border styles, shadow effects) must align with the overall design system.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "3afcfb38f4"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Typography:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Define font size, weight, and color for placeholder text, input text, and suggestions.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "2a81cabc5e"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Spacing:", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " Ensure consistent padding and margins around elements within the searchbar and between the searchbar and other components.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "0ed3acd196"}, "content": [{"text": "### 7. Best Practices & Common Patterns (Summary)", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "0401627aec"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Make it visible and easy to find", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " on every page.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "30a05f71a8"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Use clear placeholder text", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " to guide users.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "908b444b78"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Include a magnifying glass icon", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " as a universally recognized symbol.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "ddd2b2eb09"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Ensure the input field is adequately wide", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " (at least 27 characters) to display queries without scrolling.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "9c587ea89d"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Provide autocomplete and search suggestions", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " to aid users and reduce typing effort.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "3d207c201f"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Offer a clear/reset button", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " to easily clear the input.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "2534a7028b"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Design for mobile-first", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": ", ensuring accessibility and usability on small screens.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "9f70728b83"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Handle empty search results gracefully", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " with helpful alternatives.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "627703f7b7"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Avoid offering advanced search as the default option", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " to prevent user confusion.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "1becab4e58"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Keep the keyword in the field", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " after search submission.", "type": "text"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "c01ffa394a"}, "content": [{"text": "*   ", "type": "text"}, {"text": "Consider providing immediate feedback", "type": "text", "marks": [{"type": "strong", "attrs": {"blockId": ""}}]}, {"text": " like loading indicators if results aren't instantaneous.", "type": "text"}]}]}
raw.introduction_node: {"type": "doc", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"blockId": "7d4ae3385f"}, "content": [{"text": "The Searchbar component provides users with a standardized way to retrieve relevant information within the presented content quickly. It serves as a primary navigation and discovery tool, especially in scenarios where the user is able to formulate what they are looking for.", "type": "text"}]}]}
